snippet: Authorities try to piece together the scene of a shooting and the lives of an ex-Navy SEAL sniper who was killed by a former Marine.
abstract: Texas authorities are trying to piece together fatal shooting of retired Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyle at firing range by former Marine Eddie Ray Routh, who Kyle was trying to help adjust to civilian life.

byline.contributor: Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting from New York, and Kathryn Jones from Glen Rose, Tex.

lead_paragraph: Authorities try to piece together the scene of a shooting and the lives of an ex-Navy SEAL sniper who was killed by a former Marine.

headline.seo: Former Sniper Chris Kyle Tried to Help Troubled Marine Accused in His Death
headline.main: Ex-Sniper Extended Hand to Troubled Marine Accused in His Death
headline.print_headline: Ex-Sniper Extended Hand to Troubled Marine Accused in His Death
